website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 90 Neo Classic is the best-looking Instax Mini camera out there, and offers improved features compared with more basic models.
pros: Self-timer, bulb, and double exposure options
cons: Smallest of current instant film formats

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Millennial technology.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and easy to operate. Makes you treat each photo that you take a little more seriously, because the shot that you take is the shot that you get - no photo-shopping possible - just like in the old days!! Half the fun is explaining to Millennials the concept of a photo that CAN'T be uploaded onto social media to get "likes". I like digging through my handbag to find the photo of my cat (with her name written on). It's a REAL photo. One you can stick on the fridge. Yes, THAT real.
customer_reviews.author: JSC

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, love the design.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, love the design, wish I used it more often but it is much easier to take pictures with my phone since I have it all the time. If you’re on the fence like I was, perhaps consider an instax printer which allows you to print instant photos from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: James Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun to use- and creative
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It’s easy to use- and with a bit of creativity and time (and some trial and error to learn the ins and outs of the camera) you can get some pretty cool photos. I got this one over other models as I thought it had a bit more of manual control and some added features (double and bulb exposure). Shame the size of the photos is really quite small- but you can make a sketch notebook or get a photo album to keep them and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: RitaL

customer_reviews.title: Present for girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my girlfriend who loves this camera. Looks really cool in the retro design and really easy to use. She loves creating scrapbooks with the pictures she takes and even gave one of said scrapbooks away as a wedding gift to her sister and brother in law after taking photos at their wedding. All in all a great camera, although buying lots of film for it can get expensive very quickly - so make sure you're taking decent photos!
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Photograph your own cigarette cards
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and easy to use device. Good quality instant films that develop nicely over time spent taking other shots. Still playing around with the various settings, but so far pretty satisfied. Looking forward to trying out the monochrome film aswell.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great instant picture camera.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little camera. This is the best instax we've owned so far. You can control the flash, and mode of shooting. A little hard with the view finder however that may just be me lol! The photos are the focal point of our dining room on our pinboard wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh LittleAmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: it is not a simple camera. and it's not for everyone. it takes several poses thrown to learn how to use it. but once you're inside this little machine it gives you a lot of satisfaction. I love her. pity that the films cost a lot. but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: vixluna

customer_reviews.title: prints do take at least 1 minute to develop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a birthday gift for one of my friends and she was really happy to have it. This camera is an absolute must have! The prints are amazing for scrapbooks. Aesthetically is so beautiful to see and so vintage. The quality of the pictures is so good and clear and prints do take at least 1 minute to develop. I really recommend it if you’re searching a camera like this.
customer_reviews.author: tangir ahammed miah

customer_reviews.title: Retro cool pressie
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a retro type camera for a friend. This was absolutely perfect. The images were quite small but this kind of added to he retro style. It went down a treat...
customer_reviews.author: MrsH

customer_reviews.title: If i only knew how much fun it is!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant buy and if you seek for real joy of use and something special - this will fit the bill. Picture quality is suprisingly good, thou Id feel better with glass optics. Its smaller than on pictures and I can only recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brutal De Luxe

customer_reviews.title: A fun camera with below average picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is below par indoors, let’s hope they are better under natural light. The flash, although it’s blinding, only lights up to about 3 feet away in any meaningful way. The camera looks nice and retro and the recipient was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dunn it

customer_reviews.title: Lovely camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a step up from some of the older Instax models, with some great features. I only use it for special occasions, because the film is quite expensive, but I do love using it and I would recommend it to anyone who likes to keep physical photos of important events.
customer_reviews.author: Nyx

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite some time looking at which Polaroid camera to buy and decided on this one as it is more than just a point and shoot camera. It's easy to work and offers some great extra options such as timer, double exposure, macro etc. Seller was helpful with questions and delivered fast even though I was happy to wait with it not being an essential item! Would recommend 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong plug!
customer_reviews.text: Product mostly as expected and this was the best price I found for it but the battery charger came with a European plug which is of no use to me in England so that is quite disappointing as now I will have to get a plug adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: This a great camera, I absolutely love it and its great ...
customer_reviews.text: This a great camera, I absolutely love it and its great that it comes with a rechargeable battery. Takes really good quality photos and I kind of like the fact that the picture sizes are quite small. If it were any bigger then the camera would be huge and a nightmare to carry around. Overall great size.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: The style of the camera and the user freindly way it operates.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had used this camera recently at a family wedding, owned by her cousin. She asked if she could have one for Christmas. Hence us buying one.
customer_reviews.author: MLK

customer_reviews.title: probably the nicest/best at this price point. Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Daughter, She loves it and it looks pretty retro cool! well built and feels like a decent bit of kit. We spent a bit of time looking at these and choosing this one, it is what it is, but was happy with it when it arrived, don't feel let down by this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: C & M Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery and camera like new
customer_reviews.text: Perfect delivery and service. I was worried because the camera is an used item but it looks in perfect condition and everything has been well packaged as they told in descriptions. I'm satisfied about the good quality of pictures. It just takes a little time and practice to get used to and learn how to take the best shoots , especially if you are beginner with these cameras, like me. But that's part of fun. I'm having a lot of fun with my shots now!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Not even year old stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It turns on the film loads fine but it doesn’t take any photos the shutter won’t release. The number of photos displayed on the camera is incorrect . I’ve wasted two lots of film and the camera is fully charged . Had it for less then a year have had no issues until now very upset loved my little camera . I won’t be buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera only downside is that the refills are expensive but nothing to do with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera !
customer_reviews.text: I recommend reading the manual and watching a few videos before you start using it. You can get creative and experiment. I'm very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Patri Plenaluna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I bought two for a competition then I went and bought myself one as I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin O.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little camera for capturing instant memories and putting straight ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for capturing instant memories and putting straight into an album - it’s also great fun for budding photographers!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynndy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible picture quality for a polaroid
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a lemon or it's just the model, but the picture quality is abysmal. People shared many polaroids with me from other models, Polaroid and (cheaper) Instax's and all of them looked much clearer than pictures taken by this device in the same conditions. The camera looks good, but the pics are not, and that's what counts. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sjoerd

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. This looks like a vintage camera but has the quality of a modern one!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Decent little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Not amazing picture quality but that could be the photographer! Great for weddings and family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Used this for our mixed baby shower and got some lovely pics. Really light and the handle makes it easy to use/carry. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great fun camera
customer_reviews.text: Great fun camera, has provided plenty of entertainment and talking points on nights out and at events. My biggest issue is the pictures are quite small and pretty expensive for all they are but I've found people are happy to hold a photo in the current digital generation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Burchy

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely great camera
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great camera. From all of the instant cameras I looked at was very glad I bough this one. Pictures are great and it is very easy to use. Bought for a 12 year old who loves it. We have loads of excellent and quirky pictures now
customer_reviews.author: inderjit singh

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is bigger than what I expected. It's easy to use and the pictures are great, they don't have an automatic vintage filter like Polaroid photos now have. Don't capture very well landscapes, especially when people pose in front of a view, but great for close-up portraits.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for one off instant photos. write messages on them and stick it in a scrap book.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Capture the memories instantly
customer_reviews.text: Great product... perfect for capturing a moment on the spot with great features... I use it all the time and with tutorial on YouTube you can really make great photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr TMG

customer_reviews.title: The highest level of great
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVOURITE CAMERA!! This is very good- I’m a artist so this is great for being creative.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera for passing out photos at family functions and party's
customer_reviews.author: JonnyMac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great present idea. Buy some refills when buying this tho
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera for portrait photos
customer_reviews.text: I find the camera only really takes good portrait pictures, that is pictures of people. Scenary or pictures of building or things in the distance not so good. Also doesn’t take good photos at night other than close ups of people.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Love my Intax mini
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to capture special moments during my trips, the quality of pictures is very good and it is also easy to use. I love that it looks classy and it's not big. would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefania Medina

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this, very expensive when factoring cost of film though.
customer_reviews.author: marvel

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for our wedding. its easy to use and the pictures look great
customer_reviews.author: Efti

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and so do all her friends.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as one of my daughter's 18th birthday gifts. She loves it and so do all her friends. It has a cool retro look, the photos are credit card sized and she has them all around her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Manicshopper

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love love love love it . I have the instax mini 8 and the 210 and have wanted this for a while so I FINALY gave in and treated my self and let me say well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Miss Chanandler Bong

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Does really good pictures and love its retro look. Despite its look it's very light so easy to carry around, however does not feel or look "cheap" . Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok Camera for what it is but photos arnt that good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera it's now part of my camera at all weddings and photo shoots!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin C.

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant!!!!! awesome instant camera! didn't expect that it will come with 2 packs of shots... price is relevant cheap and the service is good as well. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: New toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this new camera! Easy to use and was delivered with 2 packs of films!

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, and everyone I shoot with it wants to know about it. It's great for portrait shoots – it gets people interested.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery, super fast photos
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sisters wedding... It's light, really good quality and looks so old school. I love it. Super fast delivery too

customer_reviews.title: Having so much fun with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Having so much fun with this camera!! Bought it so I can put piccies straight away in my diary. Really pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: such an amazing camera extremely happy with my purchase x

customer_reviews.title: Technical issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera on last November, but now it can not be opened. Please let me know if I can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Really good camera. I would say it's one of the best Polaroids around. Downside is that it is quite expensive for what it is, especially buying the refills.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at and produces surprisingly high quality prints.
customer_reviews.author: Baz Borozitch

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY 10 SHOT EDITION
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera with 10 shots, guess what did not come with the camera, the 10 shots, just buy the normal one

customer_reviews.title: A really fun present and item to own
customer_reviews.text: A genuinely fun product, well designed, with lots of great features, including timer.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Noce to have. Quality of pictures are like 20 years ago.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera, everyone who sees it asks about it - who doesn't love an instant camera :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: She was incredibly pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my gaughter's 14th birthday. She was incredibly pleased with it! Camera looks cool and makes great pictures. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for those who are a bit lazy like me and don't get important pictures developed

customer_reviews.title: Good, but doesn't have a Uk plug.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an xmas present for my daughter. Camera looks fab but I'm glad I checked in the box as the one I received contains a 2 pin plug for the charger so I'll have to buy an adapter for it.

customer_reviews.title: Little pics, big fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy to use, great for little spur of the moment keepsake photos.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

customer_reviews.text: The camera is amazing but now we can't use it (have only had it a week) because the top pin on the UK plug is made of plastic and has snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Helen R Harris

customer_reviews.title: Over the moon
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting to buy an instant camera for a long time. I am so happy I finally got to it. The photos that come out are so small but so cute.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer

customer_reviews.text: I have no problems with this product, it does exactly what you want if you research it and the photos always look great

customer_reviews.text: Got it as present for my sister for her 16th birthday. She absolutely loves it, still trying to figure out all the settings etc but thats to be expected from a polaroid camera.

customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. The retro style, the quality of the pics - everything :) great present for a photography lover

customer_reviews.title: Great for weddings and other family occasions

customer_reviews.text: i love it very nice , for great moments shots

customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the camera well made looks are good not cheap looking great retro style excellent instant camera that takes great pictures too great features and battery life as well.

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a UK plug for the charger.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Only downside to the purchase was it came with the wrong charger, was not a UK plug.

customer_reviews.title: I had problems with the first order and the company ...
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with the first order and the company was very supportive in providing what I needed free of charge. Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: Love it, oso good. Amazing experience. Just not so so good for night pics of places But I recommend! (:

customer_reviews.text: It's just amazing!the best Fuji instacameta !love it so much!

customer_reviews.title: Great camera

customer_reviews.text: I recevied my camera today but the free film was missing...will this be dispatched separately? Great product but not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sushma Chohan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant fun, you pay extra for retro
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fun, and the pictures are better than other small instant cameras that are currently out there, this camera is the same as the £60 version, you are only paying for the retro look, it doesn't contain any advanced features. Very simple to use (one you get used to the eyepiece being off centre) I love the retro look, although it's fully plastic, not great for the high price, but it does look smart, if this was cheaper then it would be a 5 star item film isn't cheap, but then no instant camera ever is, black and white film is also available
customer_reviews.author: John Tate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a photographer. I just want to get photos of my friend's and I so that in 30 years I can pick up a physical copy of my pictures and remember where I was and what I was doing. This camera is exactly what I wanted and more.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love the functions and results! It's the right size to slip into any pouch and handbag without the extra bulk. Definitely great for parties and outings with friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Tzien Yung

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera , it feels retro and I love the instant photo idea , it arrived quickly and we have had hours of fun learning how to use all the functions.
customer_reviews.author: biffy

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my daughters birthday. She's already had good fun experimenting taking pictures and loves the retro style.
customer_reviews.author: D Cutts

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera even though you might view this as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera even though you might view this as a 'novelty' the camera itself is no slouch. Seller needs to make it clear that this product DOES NOT COME WITH FILM, even though some of the reviews said it did. So, make sure you order it separately as if its a gift the recipient will be disappointed they can't use it straight away. Films are a bit pricey for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Lecatlady

customer_reviews.title: Instant Gratification
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera, real headturner and people always ove instant. Project in the works using this camera! Came with 2 free films too :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, arrived a day earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, arrived a day earlier than expected. I was a little worried as some reviews had said there would be an EU plug etc but was pleasantly surprised to find the UK plug and it came with two free packs of film. Fantastic camera, slightly bigger than i expected but still smaller than an original polaroid 600. An excellent replacement for anyone who loves the fun of polaroids but at a fraction of the cost for film. I bought mine straight from the amazon seller (as opposed to one of the others)
customer_reviews.author: stella Fielder

customer_reviews.title: Much better than yesteryear's instant cameras
customer_reviews.text: Something of a walk down memory lane to the days of Polaroid Cameras but there the similarity ends. This camera is in entirely different league and an absolute delight to use
customer_reviews.author: John Watts

customer_reviews.title: I am selling my instax 90 with 30 films
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last November and it's almost like new. I need money now so I am selling it together with 30 films (10 films already inside the camera). You can check the details under the used cameras. If you stays near Cambridge and would like to pick it up, I can deduct £5 delivery fees. Leave a message if you are interested. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: TONGTONG

customer_reviews.title: A lovely camera
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly chunky and a tiny bit plasticy but this camera has done me proud. Battery life is great, I got two packs of film and a UK charger too so it looks like they fixed that problem. Modes are good! It's pretty hard to ruin a shot with all the choices (especially light, light + and dark) but the position of the viewfinder in comparison to the lens can be tricky at first. Also make sure you know where the shutters are before you take it out and shoot, it's easy to accidentally take a photo when handling. Perfect for any photo geek
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera with its vintage look
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera with its vintage look. We assigned a friend to take pictures of our guests at our wedding and have them write a few words next to their picture - the result is great. We also took it on honeymoon and have put together a lovely record with these very effective pictures. Warning, they are a lot smaller than the old polaroid cameras!
customer_reviews.author: ReefG

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly designed and brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best instax camera you can get, to be honest easier to use, better results and and more compact than the new lomography instax. The modes rock and it is intuitive to use. A perfectly designed and brilliant camera. Buy and get shooting
customer_reviews.author: Simon

product_meta.title: instax Mini 90 NEO Classic Camera, Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Camera OnlyThe Instax Mini 90 NEO Classic Camera brings enhanced features (double exposure, bulb exposure, flash adjustment, etc.) with an elegant retro-look design (a two-tone black and silver finish) to photo enthusiasts looking for an enjoyable gadget or a step up from their entry-level Instax model.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Please note prior to dispatch the product we/supplier open the Box in order to make sure all the Contents and Accessories are present and then we put our Company’s seal (if required) or Supplier’s Quality Checked Seal which means that the Product has been inspected & Quality Checked. This does not mean that the warranty of Manufacturer is void. The product has full Manufacturer's or Network’s warranty.(see warranty terms & conditions).

BOX CONTAINS


 * Mini 90 camera
 * Shoulder strap
 * Warranty
 * NP-45A rechargeable battery
 * BC-45C battery charger
 * Instruction manual



See more
feature_bullets: Six shooting modes including, kids and party mode
High performance three mode automatic electronic flash (forced firing, flash off and red eye reduction)
Brightness control with normal, low key and high key effects
Film (W x H): 54 x 86 mm, picture size (W x H): 46 x 62 mm
Power supply: NP-45A lithium ion re-chargeable battery

specifications.Included Components: Fujifilm Instax Mini 90 Neo Classic Instant Film Camera^1-Lithium Metal Batteries
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,480 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
